lender.name: Rick & Liz
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to help hard-working people in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: If you are not part of the solution, you are part of the problem.

lender.name: Ferdie & Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: We wish to help others that are not so fortunate, so too that they can achieve something for themselves.It is our responsibilty to lift others.
lender.occupational_info: I help finance clients loans for their automotive needs

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with abundance. Tikkun alam.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a daily newspaper journalist since 1968.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help people who are working so hard and just need a little boost. We've all needed a boost in our lives at some time.
lender.occupational_info: I am spending time recuperating from an illness and moving from one house to another. I have just sent my fifth child off to college - three are now on their own and two are still in school. I am the proudest mother of all! Family is very important.

lender.name: Abdulla
lender.loan_because: An-Nisa (Women) In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful O mankind! Be careful of your duty to your Lord Who created you from a single soul and from it created its mate and from them twain hath spread abroad a multitude of men and women. (QURAN CHAPTER 4: Verse 1)... if we were all created from a single soul..then we are all ONE...
lender.occupational_info: give a little back (ita not yours after all) you owe it to you brothers and sisters we all need a lending hand to make the world a better place

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Anytime I think I am struggling, I realize I have it so much better than so many people. My giving up the cost of one meal out to help another person survive is an amazing opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with banks to create reports about their customers and their accounts.

lender.name: Trinh & Van Anh
lender.loan_because: "This could be me in another life In another set of circumstances"
lender.occupational_info: Delivering smiles

lender.name: Marg Swan Shulman
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate and want to share some of what I have with other hard working individuals. I hope that I can help them achieve their goals just like I did.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves and to follow the example of the man who won the Nobel Prize for starting the micro-loan business in India.
lender.occupational_info: I write and do a little publishing of books for young people and also create sculptures.

lender.name: Tim & Aubrey
lender.loan_because: access to capital is essential to relieving poverty!

lender.name: Leena
lender.loan_because: God blesses us so that we share his abundance. Whatever I give I always get back in many ways--that is how the world was intended to work :)

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: Access to capital from Foreign Direct Investment allows individuals help themselves without government beauracracy and corruption. The more people are able to stand on their own through markets and rule of law, subnational violence and transnational terrorism will disappear. This would achieve my goal of world piece with the Pentagon as a museum that the world would visit as a memorial for all who have sacraficed for a better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I loan for deserving, hardworking individuals desiring change for themselves, their family, their country, and the world.

lender.name: Endurance
lender.loan_because: no one controls their initial endowment but we can all shape our future. As I continue to learn more about this plight of life I realize it is my duty to help and my gift to give. It is not someone else's problem; It is our shared dilemma. One that, through religion, color, or ideal will bring us together; as the same God watches over all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I do this very thing everyday. I lend money to people. I work for a bank. It is a desk job. I don't see the sun for a majority of the day or breathe fresh air. I look at a computer screen and do math on people and companies to try and figure out if they have the necessary cash flow and integrity to repay loaned money. It is not physically-demanding only mentally draining.

lender.name: Nadia ML
lender.loan_because: it empowers motivated individuals to follow their dreams and become financially self-sufficient, which in turn strengthens entire families, communities and eventually, our world.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to support micro businesses in poverty stricken areas of the world.

lender.name: Britt
lender.loan_because: Our class raised money for kiva.org by hosting a silent auction where we sold murals that we made which depicted the world. We want to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Our class focuses on service learning because through this we are able to have a greater understanding of other communities and cultures, it helps give us a greater global sense.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: of Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: preaching Jesus. comforting the afflicted, afflicting the comfortable.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: i am a certified English teacher. Learning English has been my passion since I was a child, and my interests kept growing as traveling to many countries. I visited many developped countries and I realized that there are many things we could improve here in Peru. Peru is a beautiful country filled with riches and natural resources although there is a lot of poverty here. My dream is to make a living and at the same time helping others improving Education, Hygiene,etc As an English educator and other languages as well.

lender.name: Zusatzveranstaltung Eng
lender.occupational_info: We would like to show friends of us, how easy it is to support entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially from less developed countries, to empowering them to lift themselfs out of poverty. We ask you for a small donation of less than 1 Euro, which we will be collecting and transfering it up to our Kiva's account.

lender.name: Lene
lender.occupational_info: Single mom - 2 children aged 12 and 13

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I beleive everyone should have the opportunity to make dreams a reality. I have been afforded the opportunity of education and a good job to support my family. I wish to give others the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a college and have the privelage/opportunity to watch young minds expand in their thinking and open up to new information and opportunities.

lender.name: swamp3r
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help out and know that your money is directly helping an individual achieve their goals/dreams.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives in a positive manner.

lender.name: Karin Wells
lender.loan_because: I have enough to meet my needs and am glad to be able to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I paint pictures. You can see them at http://www.KarinWells.com and also at http://www.Oilpnt.com

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: it is better than a gift....a loan provides an incentive to succeed in business. Like the pooled investments, microfinancing , ability to help women in particular.
lender.occupational_info: I no longer work for pay, but I spent many years helping people figure out how computers could help them in their businesses.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: As a citizen of the United States, it's my responsibility.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to provide an opportunity for others to be able to succeed and hopefully, this shall encourage them to help other people in return.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a team that provides engineering operations support to a local critical care hospital.

lender.name: Maja
lender.loan_because: I want to support people in a worthy way without making them feel ashamed or too thankful for what is little for me. They should achieve what they work for.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a newspaper. I write texts about what happens in my city and the region where I live - which is Northern Germany. I also work for a regional radio station.

lender.name: Moira and Allan
lender.loan_because: We first heard of Kiva when we were given a gift certificate. We like this way of supporting entrepreneurs as we can follow their progress and share in their success as they show how their businesses are working through their ability to pay back their loan and so make it available for someone else. We believe this is an empowering way of supporting small business people in challenging circumstances and we can also learn something about them and their situation too. We all are winners!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: i makes some music!!

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Teacher Training.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I want to help out

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: Everyday I wake in the morning only thinking of myself. One day I woke up and wondered what the world would be like if everyone cared for others. I got this kiva gift certificate and thought this is a wonderful way to give back. I hope this dotation will help you.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Pareto would be proud. Nobody loses here.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the daily and longer term affairs of the Town and Villages within it.

lender.name: Gaby
lender.loan_because: This has got to be one of the best causes I've ever seen.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepeneurs, in a way. If they invent something, I make sure they get a patent for it. :)

lender.name: Kithanae
lender.loan_because: I love to help people. I know I'm doing a lot better than many other people out there, and I'm willing to do what I can to make others lives easier.
lender.occupational_info: I wear a suit, and sell investments. It's very boring!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who farm, especially women.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help sick and poor people when they come to the hospital. I try to do as much as I can to advocate for the right of all people to get adequate health care.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: IT IS VERY REWARDING TO BE PART OF SOMEONE'S SUCCESS BUILDING THEIR BUSINESS
lender.occupational_info: I STAY HOME & USE MY TIME TO KNIT, GARDEN & VOLUNTEER

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to help those persons who suffer true poverty. Not the North American Style, whereby we suffer from life style choices and have abilities to change.
lender.occupational_info: I own two Employment Agencies, one employment newspaper and a HR Consulting firm. I believe that new immigrants to Canada should have an opportunity to thrive from the beginning of their journey of making Canada their home!

lender.name: chrissy
lender.loan_because: jesus would
lender.occupational_info: i try to do stuff jesus would do in buffalo, ny.!

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the ripple effect.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: My parents won't let me join the Peace Corps.
lender.occupational_info: Some of us blonds are smart ya know?

lender.name: Jacquelyn
lender.loan_because: I want to give a hand up, not a hand out.

lender.name: Andrea Ævars
lender.loan_because:
I want the world to be a better place and I believe that what goes around, comes around.
I also want the world to be a better place where my sons can have a happy life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student, specializing in library and information science. I'm also heathen and proud of it :)

lender.name: Katya
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. Here in our rich, material societies we often take for granted the value of what we have and what we have to give...I want my children to grow up with an appreciation for the wider scope.
lender.occupational_info: I have recently left my job as a retail manager (selling clothes and managing a clothing store) to raise my newborn son (who will be due this year in June).

lender.name: Aeron
lender.loan_because: I'm a small business owner/do-it-yourselfer as well.
lender.occupational_info: I paint paintings in watercolor and oil of landscapes and the beautiful scenery around Virginia. I also train horses and rescue horses in need and fix them up and find them good homes.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is so much more empowering to loan people money to build self-sustaining ventures than it is to just give money to solve an immediate need. I think Kiva is an incredible program.
lender.occupational_info: I help small business owners in the U.S. decide what they really want, make plans to reach these goals, and then overcome all the obstacles they face while executing their plan.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I admire the strength and drive of the entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of people who work to keep our country safe.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who have a vision for improving their life. It's personally motivating to see and read about others around the world that will not let any obstacles block them from achieving their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the computer industry and work with a team that manages a large number of web servers.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to help people have better lives.

lender.name: MBG & Mindy Millington
lender.loan_because: I have needed a helping hand before, and I know what it is like to just need a little more capital to become successful. God has given me and my family so much, I like to give back when I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I Custom Design Websites and I help individuals get started in a home based business online and offline.
If anyone would like to work from home using their computers with no risk, please visit www.GoFearless.com.

lender.name: Francesca
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me this $25 to spend on your site. I love the idea of it and look forward to seeing it's impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of 4year old children. Most of my students come from Haiti. I like the idea that I am helping a haitian woman start a business.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, and this is a simple yet effective way to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time student, as well as a part time cashier.

lender.name: Cindi
lender.loan_because: The amount of money wasted in developed nations is obscene, and I want to do what I can.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me, and I want to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can to publicize the work of the MHMRA of Harris County and advocate for people living with mental health disorders and intellectual/developmental disabilities.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I like to see entrepreneurs succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to learn how to help the elderly stay active.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: A little bit from me makes a huge difference to someone else in the world that doesn't have the luck that I have living in the US. In my life 25 bucks disappears in seconds...and I don't remember what happened to it. That same amount will help someone improve their life hopefully in a meaningful way. Every little bit helps. Many of us can give up 25 bucks every every so often and not feel the pinch.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer that shoots travel, extreme adventure sports and outdoor lifestyle.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. Words to live by: "Love is the answer at least for most of the questions in my heart; Like why are we here, where do we go, and how come its so hard."
lender.occupational_info: I work for the United States Navy in the medical field. I help treat and care for sick patients.

lender.name: Liorah
lender.loan_because: - Kiva is an incredible organization. I get to help people over and over-- I am grateful when a loan is repaid, because then I get to help a new group. I especially like to help people or groups that want to provide education to their children, as I believe that education is one of the best keys to a better life.

lender.name: Laureanna
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I work to help others in many different ways.

lender.name: Andie
lender.loan_because: micro-financing is a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a university.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student majoring in International Studies and Spanish. I also work (one day a week) at a chain grocery store.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: to help give people a chance.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: A stranger's generosity has motivated me to reach out and help another woman in need.
lender.occupational_info: Work for medium-sized company that does contract work for the U.S. government.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances of a charitable organization.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can help make a difference in the lives of others...in simple, everyday ways.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with great abundance. In addition to supporting local charities, I want to have an impact on others in the world. Some of the charities I support are: Kiva, Inn from the Cold, Mustard Seed, AARC, UNICEF, Humane Society and Covenant House.
lender.occupational_info: I am a director at a long term treament centre for substance dependent youth.

lender.name: Mac & Maureen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My husband sells Audio Visual/Staging equipment for conventions and conferences. I am a stay-at-home mom to my 7 month old daughter.

lender.name: Brett,Bin,Ryder,Clare
lender.loan_because: WE loan because we hope to fill others lives with as much happiness as our own.
lender.occupational_info: We are parents to 2 beautiful children! 4yr old son "Ryder Mitchell" and 1 year old daughter "Clare Adeline" so that is our first job!.(and our favourite job!)...I work as a nurse with elderly people mostly with dementia. My husband is a Sports/ P.E High School Teacher.

lender.name: Dunja
lender.loan_because: I feel that Kiva is a wonderful organization that allows people to reach out across the world and make a difference.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have been given the opportunities I have. I want to share that with others. Dreams should not have to be just dreams. "Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake." - Henry David Thoreau

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I've seen the truly poor and would feel guilty if I didn't try to help.
lender.occupational_info: We set up equipment to measure the earths magnetic and electrical fields. We may of been in your back yard.

lender.name: Grad & Gram
lender.loan_because: My dad, gram and I all love to travel. The next trip is Ghana!
lender.occupational_info: Student and my gram is retired.

lender.name: Shannon Stange
lender.loan_because: I believe that in the heart of people around the world they want the dignity of having created income for themselves rather than receiving charity.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur at heart that has started a few different companies. I am currently building a commercial construction company that builds offices.

lender.name: Euler
lender.loan_because: I want to help other become self-sufficient and improve their livelihood.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with the legal elements of their business transactions.

lender.name: 1plus.net
lender.loan_because: As entrepreneurs ourselves we recognise and respect people willing to give a good idea a go.
lender.occupational_info: We are a digital media company who work on behalf of various clients in a number of internet verticals

lender.name: KANTHI
lender.loan_because: make little change in d world

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone who is willing to work for an opportunity deserves one.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: rather than investing for My future, I loan so that People Can have a Future.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Merran
lender.loan_because: We have so much and other people can do so much with so little.

lender.name: Lukman
lender.loan_because: I wish to open business is selling sofware and hardware his conspecific computer and goods.
lender.occupational_info: Now I still working in one of company retail, as an inventory clerk.

lender.name: kilometre club
lender.loan_because: we all feel blessed and so we think we should share our blessings

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: this is a great mechanism to contribute a little to other people's future well-being.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager with a Public Works Authority in Qatar.

lender.name: ESIRC
lender.loan_because: We lend to empower and give dignity to poor people, fight poverty and contribute to achieving the Millennium Development Goals.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and wish to share the blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a computer, producing scientific reports.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Naoko
lender.loan_because: I like the way to assist people who need help in business.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping by supporting local initiatives

lender.name: Kaliroi
lender.loan_because: Every person has the potential for making a difference in the world. I feel good when I know that someone benefited from my support.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I can and it keeps me connected to places I've been.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe a chance for success should be afforded to all those who have dreams, not just to those who have dreams and money.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for a major, urban university. State funding usually only covers about 17% of our yearly budget, we raise money so that the students do not have to pay more for tuition.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a new home.

lender.name: bane putra
lender.loan_because: i used to be same like them.i grew up cause there a people that care for me.thats why i care with them
lender.occupational_info: im a maker of tv programme that called 'autoholic' its about automotive lifestyle in indonesia

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupation: Yoga teacher and Small Business Owner

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: College Student

lender.name: Tim & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: We want to help others that don't have the opportunities that we do. Microfinancing is a fabulous vehicle to allow anyone to invest as little as $25 to helping deserving, hard working people in developing countries build a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others build a "bigger future" than their past.

lender.name: donald
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a small nonprofit so that we can provide tutoring programs to students in Chicago Public Schools

lender.name: Bernd
lender.loan_because: In my opinion the best way is to become independent.
lender.occupational_info: everybody know`s.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Khadijah Hassanah
lender.occupation: I am a mother and a wife to a wonderful family.
lender.loan_because: if you give a man a fish, he will eat for a day. But if you teach a man how to fish, he will be able to eat for life.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in building a better world by promoting world peace.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help others that are less fortunate than I am and I can see the difference that I make.
lender.occupational_info: I serve in my country's military.

lender.name: Sumit
lender.loan_because:
I know how much struggle it is to run a business with limited financial resources and that every little bit helps.
Thanks KIVA for putting this together

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of giving. As an entrepreneur, I can relate to the struggles of trying to make enough money in order to provide for my children. I give because I want them to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I provide small business owners with bookkeeping, QuickBooks consulting, and tax preparation services. Basically, I help entrepreneurs manage their finances so they are free to make more money.

lender.name: The Jacksons
lender.loan_because: It is amazing to me to actually see the results of my actions versus just giving a check to a charity without really knowing what it accomplishes.

lender.name: Megastar Media
lender.loan_because: Knowing that we are helping others around the world build their dreams is such a great high!
lender.occupational_info:
Since 1999. We build social networks, custom web designs and fan club communities for really smart business people.
Mega Star Media INC

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro-finance is a great way to help people in the developing world to reach their own goals, rather than goals imposed by The World Bank, NGOs or governments!
lender.occupational_info: I teach students in a Master's degree program to become speech-language therapists. I specialize in working with adolescents and adults with acquired brain injuries from trauma, stroke, and diseases.

lender.name: Steve Skinner
lender.loan_because: Seems to me that God has blessed America not so that we can be rich, but so that we can share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with government officials to get them to do what is right.

lender.name: Mauro
lender.loan_because: oh, well ... it is probably because i believe that sharing is the "way"

lender.name: Arian
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to *really* help people with a small amount of money, over and over again! Bahá'u'lláh taught us that "The world is but one country and mankind its citizens"... We need to help each other wherever and whenever we can!
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying Dentistry at the University of Amsterdam.

lender.name: Ingy

lender.occupational_info: My doughter is a midife, she has 2 children and I take care of them while she works. Also I took care of my mother who recently died on the age of 97.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I own...I can...I care...

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love to have an impact on struggling entrepreneurs lives.

lender.occupational_info: I help fulfill dreams by connecting people with money. Primarily for use in purchasing a home.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus.

lender.name: Tara

lender.occupational_info: I work on cancer research studies.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I know that I am here for a reason and I am compelled to give. I feel the only way for me to live a purpose driven life is to do all I can to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I majored in International Business in hopes of starting a non-profit organization.

lender.name: Dieter at primo:gy
lender.loan_because: Through KIVA, I hope to support committed micro businesses and sustainable entrepreneurship in general, esp. in areas increasingly affected by side effects of global warming.
lender.occupational_info: At primo:gy climate change consulting, we provide strategic management and communication consulting services, focussing on corporate climate change solutions. Our core competencies are management consulting, training and workshops. For more information please visit our webpage.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by people everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office building in downtown San Francisco, California.

lender.name: Marc

lender.occupational_info: i make personal documentary films about myself & my friends. see: http://www.myspace.com/marcisraelfilms

lender.occupational_info: I am working towards my college degree and I hope to pursue a career in bilingual or English as Second Language education, because language is so powerful!

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: I love to help!!

lender.occupational_info: Yo trabajo interpretando español y ayudando la gente en un hospital de Tejas. Que Dios le bendiga.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.occupational_info: I work to maintain current information on rare species populations within southern Maryland in the US.

lender.name: Gary & Crew
lender.loan_because: Well... "Life is full of suffering (spiritually and physically)... Suffering is caused by desire and ignorance... However, suffering can be eliminated through four tools; hard work (effort), mediation (prayer), understanding (study), and compassion (No one said liberation would be easy)... In daily practice keep in mind "You will reap what you sow... Either here in the present, or in the afterlife." and because we should all help each other... "Under the bright sun, many of us are gathered together with different languages, different styles of dress, even different faiths. However, all of us are the same in being humans, and we all uniquely have the thought of I, and we´re all the same in wanting happiness and in wanting to avoid suffering."
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team effort of inspection, testing and maintaining a variety of fire protection - life safety systems at numerous properties in the mid-atlantic region.

lender.name: Linda Miller
lender.loan_because: I was born in America
lender.occupational_info: I write words on a computer

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: It would be selfish and irresponsible of me not to loan. Although I do not have a lot of disposable income, I have enough to share with people who are trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Fulltime student

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to! I also think it's good to show my kids how easy helping someone out can be.
lender.occupational_info: I work in 2 hospitals. At the one I work at an adult outpatient clinic. The other hospital is a children's hospital and I work in Day Surgery.

lender.name: Annabelle
lender.loan_because: My grandparents gave me the money to lend.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the 5th grade.

lender.loan_because: My grandparents gave me some money to lend
lender.occupational_info: I am in the 1st grade.

lender.loan_because: Me robaron el material de trabajo, los tanques que se utilizan para la mescla de los compuestos quimico y el equipo de seguridad para evitar las intocxicaciones.
lender.occupational_info: Tengo un pequeno negocio de fumigaciones, especialmente para hogares.y necesito un prestamo de 1200 dolares . pagando 100 dollares por mes. ya que me servira este dinero para reponer el equipo queme fue robado.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I think its a wonderful way to help people lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We collect and analyze water samples from Missouri streams and lakes.

lender.name: Terri, Rene, Chilli Dog
lender.occupation: Retired Air Force, Navy Corpsman, Wonder Dog
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate enough to live in a country where we have the opportunities for successful careers and have everything we need and want - now we want to give others a chance to build a business that can support their families and improve their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the Air Force, my husband is still in the Navy, Chilli is 11 years old and a wonderful dog!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I loan because people have encouraged me all of my life and it's my joy to encourage others.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of passing on to future generations the best that this world has given me: the Bible, Music, Literature, Languages and the Arts.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good idea to donate money.

lender.name: Casey
lender.occupational_info: The teaching of economics, history, and global issues to the leaders of tomorrow requires action. This is our small part to help make this place a more sustainable world.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I am overwhelmed by the needs of others in the world. Their needs compel me. I have been blessed with so much. It would be of the greatest crime not to help when it's in my ability to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I design pages like those you see on the internet.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others! My goal in 2012 is to make at least one loan per month.
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency dept. nurse. I am an Arizona native, but have traveled extensively.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.occupational_info: I help save sea turtles along the Caribbean Coast in Costa Rica.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I seek to help underprivileged individuals have the opportunity to expand their businesses and achieve their goals.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: My son Chuck gave me the gift as a Mother's Day present. A very thoughtful gift. He's just that kinda guy.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from property management and I am a potter. I love to play in the mud.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to take a small amount of money and make a large difference in the lives of those that are trying to improve themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not for profit in health care and am responsible for the financial administration of the organization.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Sharing wealth creates wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I design mines where raw minerals are extracted in an environmentally sound manner to make materials that build good lives for everyone.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: it's cool to help people.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Mothers' Day to use to get started with Kiva loans. I want to help others who work so hard and for so many hours for so little money to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher for 35 years. After I retired I studied to become a spiritual director. As I listen to others talk about their lives I try to help them to see how God is present and acting in their lives.

lender.name: Pan
lender.loan_because: These loans make a difference to people who need them.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Outsourcing business

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to build their own sustainable lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help people cope with difficult feelings when their feelings are making it hard for them to work and love.

lender.name: Derek and Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe God loves people all over the world, and because of this, that I should be concerned about the welfare of people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Derek is studying the Bible and Christianity at a Bible college, and I (Amy) am studying elementary education. We both want to work internationally telling people about God after we graduate.

lender.name: Fabio & family
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is an effective way to help people in other countries. Probably one of the best way to use money.

lender.name: Eilene
lender.loan_because: My son introduced me to Kiva and I enjoy seeing other people prosper
lender.occupational_info: Reitred

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I do not believe in investing in stocks, mutual funds, etc. To me, those things are part of the problem. I do not want to invest in that which is destroying the world. I want to transform my money into something useful and real that creates positive change. I especially want to help other farmers, the ones that feed us!
lender.occupational_info: I grow vegetables organically, without any chemical fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides. I sell at a summer farmers' market in Victoria BC.

lender.name: Jake Brown
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to start a business from scratch without any help.
lender.occupational_info: I do all kinds of things, but mostly I run a business with my brother.

lender.name: Nathan & Bethany
lender.loan_because: We desire to empower others to be the kinds of people they were created to be
lender.occupational_info: We are passionate about loving people and inviting them to join God in the renewal of all things

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I'm an old Peace Corps Volunteer and am always looking for ways to connect to the wider world. My daughters gave me a $25 gift certificate for Mothers Day and that's gotten me started with KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I have helped refugee children from Viet Nam find families in the U.S., supervised the work of interpreters who help patients talk with their doctors.

lender.name: Sheirin
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in the power of the community. Every little bit counts to helping improve someone's reality.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small tech businesses to connect in the United States.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I like stores.

lender.name: Brian and Natalie
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed.

lender.name: Samuel T.
lender.loan_because: i need to form a farmers cooperative in my village (Maria Aurora, Aurora,Philippines) in order for the members to make loans for their agricultural inputs like fertilizers, pesticide, post harvest facilitiesand marketing needs of their produce.
lender.occupational_info: as a farmer we would like to increased our farming production to contributes on food production and to increased members income.

lender.name: VICTOR
lender.loan_because: Providing micro credits is the best way of having a huge impact improving lives in a sustainable manner. If each of us does it individually it is good; but if we do it in a combined, flexible manner through platforms like KIVA then the impact is massive. Good job Kiva!!
lender.occupational_info: I provide energy healing advise to people, though massage, yoga, and specific workshops.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a professional organisation, that understands the economic constraints people are under in the less developed countries of the world. The Kiva methodology is simple, but effective and it just makes sense to be a part of it.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technical assistance to agriculture development projects to improve lives, sustainably.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: it helps :-)
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and companies to develop their abilities

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I loan therefore I am

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping Entrepreneurial people to achieve their goals. Its about fighting the good fight from whatever we start.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in creating mobile software solutions. Some of the solutions we create help small holder farmers in developing countries.

lender.name: Fredrik
lender.loan_because: I want to help in a more direct way than just sending money to some random organisation.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a private trader who makes a living from trading equity & currency markets.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want people around the world to eat.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph food for books and magazines!

lender.name: John Burroughs School
lender.loan_because: We want to help people, and we are interested in the improvement of the current situation in third world countries. We are looking to help people boost themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in grades 7-12 who are involved at a club at John Burroughs School. We are using this club as a means to gather support and money for the KIVA cause.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to support female entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of international relations.

lender.occupational_info: Am a trader who sells paint, cement, door locks and the likes.

lender.name: createdtopraise
lender.loan_because: I can keep re-investing in people's lives over and over again.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I love small businesses and I think everyone should have a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer as an artist. I draw and create graphics for small companies and businesses.

lender.name: Emre
lender.loan_because: i think that microcredits work and are a sustainable way to help people. 25$ may not be much to me but it could mean a lot to someone else around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: i observer people and try to find out what differences age, gender, occupation and personality makes in group interaction. from these observations, i try to derive practices that can be applied to support interdisciplinary work

lender.name: Michael

lender.name: STOBA

lender.occupational_info: Fund Management

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed; I want to show gratitude for what I have by giving to others.

lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. I paint to remind and share with people the beauty in this world.

lender.name: Ivan Judson
lender.loan_because: the economic disparity in the world is too much to bear, this is how I try to erode that division and heal things.
lender.occupational_info: I write software, manage data, and look for ways to help people learn what they need to know to get their problems solved.

lender.name: The Geiselettes

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I am very pleased to be able to help other self-employed people.

lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.

lender.name: Jack

lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Utah Valley University, and currently serve as Editor in Chief of the campus newspaper, UVU Review. I am blessed with great friends.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: Having worked with refugees and heard what kind of terrible things can happen to impoverished people and nations, I want to be able to help those who are still able to take hold of their futures and the future of their nation so that they will not be vulnerable to the hunger and terror that threaten them.
lender.occupational_info: I map and update records of electrical equipment for the power company. I am also an artist/illustrator and full-time student.

lender.name: shanna
lender.loan_because: I've received help more times than I can count and want to repay the favor.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and helping others get the help they need! I love seeing others grow and if I can help in any small way I am happy to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I run a home based business in the network marketing industry with thousands of distributors and customers all over the world - our mission is to make a living through giving - sending heartfelt messages out every day!
